mapper.select: SELECT ct.cno,c.cid, c.cname, t.tid, t.tname, sc.daily_grade, c.ccredit FROM studentms.sc sc INNER JOIN studentms.s s ON sc.sid = s.sid INNER JOIN studentms.ct ct ON sc.cno = ct.cno INNER JOIN studentms.c c ON ct.cid = c.cid INNER JOIN studentms.t t ON ct.tid = t.tid WHERE sc.sid = #{sid} AND sc.term = #{term}
